data.what_is: AutomateWoo is a marketing automation solution for Woo commerce stores.
data.product_description: AutomateWoo is a marketing automation solution for Woo commerce stores.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AutomateWoo?
Let me clear it up; my friend used this software, so he told me that the software is really good and functional equipped with all the features for your campaigns . That said if you just want to sync MailChimp, get the MailChimp for woocommerce plugin. It syncs your store so you can run abandoned cart automations and segment your lists according to purchase behaviour .

What do you dislike about AutomateWoo?
It has too many features, so people often shift from this software to other software. Another reason my friend didn't choose it is that he likes to keep his  WP sites as slim as possible, meaning he would rather use a 3rd party service than a plugin that will need constant updating or could increase the load on my site.

Recommendations to others considering AutomateWoo:
Go for it .

What problems is AutomateWoo solving and how is that benefiting you?
All the marketing campaigns are managed with ease, and the option to plug in the extensions makes it a full-fledged software to land on . It automatically reminds the customers of their carts, pending orders, etc . and also notifies inactive customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good Automation System For WooCommerce Website
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AutomateWoo?
Over the default WooCommerce functionality after placing an order AutomateWoo. It provides a lot more options than a normal notification procedure. It also allows integration to Mailchimp, Campaign Monitor, ActiveCampaign Etc. AutomateWoo makes e-commerce marketing easy.

What do you dislike about AutomateWoo?
Nothing to mention but take time to get used to. It's the same process for any new products, so no big deal.

What problems is AutomateWoo solving and how is that benefiting you?
WooCommerce store's automation, after order processing in professional style without manual actions.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about AutomateWoo?
review_question_answers.answer: Over the default WooCommerce functionality after placing an order AutomateWoo. It provides a lot more options than a normal notification procedure. It also allows integration to Mailchimp, Campaign Monitor, ActiveCampaign Etc. AutomateWoo makes e-commerce marketing easy.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about AutomateWoo?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing to mention but take time to get used to. It's the same process for any new products, so no big deal.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is AutomateWoo solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: WooCommerce store's automation, after order processing in professional style without manual actions.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AutomateWoo?
It allows you to create various automated flows - e.g. emails to send out every time someone signs up, every time you're running a certain campaign, etc.

What do you dislike about AutomateWoo?
It's not the most user-friendly way to add/remove steps - wish it required fewer clicks and refreshes

What problems is AutomateWoo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Trying to automate workflows that are essential to me running my business. I've saved some time doing this
